title: Persuade me to join your nation of choice.
body: Are you Demacian or a dirty heretic? Tell me why! List off your nation of choice and the reasons why you're a part of it.

replies.body:
So far none, I'm loyal to my fluft. 

http://pre08.deviantart.net/d839/th/pre/f/2014/344/b/b/untitled_by_lancer0519-d89chp6.png

Noxus: We have pain trains, dagger hurricanes (don't worry it actually doesn't hurt), and most importantly:

#**_DUNKS_**
I'm a crab. technically allied with the queen's army, but it is more of a pact to take down fish.
Yes, crabs are the natural enemies of fish. It makes sense now.

Bandle City: What we lack in size, we make up in big d...

DETERMINATION!

http://orig04.deviantart.net/5fc7/f/2016/091/e/4/teemo_face_2_by_johnnyhedgehog1992-d9xbf4v.png Nailed it!
Join us up here in Canada, we have Poutine

The Underworld! 
I am the master of it, lots of dead people to serve my every whim. Lots of dead people no Shadow Isle creature can control.
{{champion:136}} Debating about which anthill is better... Amazing.
Ionia: land of the skilled and yi. I just love the entire ionian support group.
